description: http://anidb.net/ch3257 [Sodom] and Gomorrah are the two gigantic King Bull (sea horses in the most literal sense) owned by the http://anidb.net/ch3252 [Franky Family]. They are named after the Biblical cities, Sodom and Gomorrah. Gomorrah is pink with red stripes and a green mane.
name: Gomorrah
